description: Nate is a lazy bear villager in the Animal Crossing series. He first appears in Doubutsu no Mori and then in Animal Crossing and Doubutsu no Mori e+, but is absent in Animal Crossing: Wild World. He later returns in Animal Crossing: City Folk, however. His name most likely comes from hibernate, although he may also be named after Treehouse localizer Nate Bihldorf.
